title: Sword of the Golden Stud
description: Bricktop - alias Jeff Carson - reckless rogue, black bastard offspring of an octoroom wench and a passing stranger...Masquerading as a white man in the violent world of the Old South, where betrayal and death await him around any corner...Fugitive, he dares undertake a journey into terror. A return to the dread plantation where he was born - and cruelly branded a slave.In a daring effort, Jeff risks his freedom and his life to save the one woman he truly loves. Save her from the man who once had owned him - and who now lives only to kill him.
author: Ashley Carter
